column4: dɛ ogyina EWURADZE no bɔfoe no enyim
column5: na Satan gyina n'abanyimfa rotoatoa no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE no bɔfoe no see Satan dɛ
column5: EWURADZE a ɔasan mu eyi Jerusalɛm no ontwuw w'enyim. Aso dɛm banyin yi nntse dɛ gyantsia a woehwim efi gya mu?"

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo no kaa kyerɛɛ hɔn a wogyinagyina n'enyim no
column4: Hom nyi ntar fi no mfi no ho. Na ɔsee Josua dɛ
column6: mama w'emumuyɛ efi wo ho kɔ

column3: Hom mfa asɔfokyɛw a ɔyɛ fɛw nsoa ne tsir. Nna wɔdze asɔfokyɛw a ɔyɛ fɛw soaa ne tsir
column4: na wɔhyɛɛ no ntar; nna EWURADZE bɔfoe no gyina hɔ."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bɔfoe no see Josua dɛ
column4: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: Sɛ ebɛnantsew m'akwan do
column6: ɔno na wo so ebɔhwɛ me fie nsɛm do
column8: na mama enya hɔn a wogyina ha yi ntamu beebi egyina."

column3: ɔwo na wo mfɛfo a wɔtsetse w'enyim
column4: afei hom ntsie; na wɔyɛ nyimpa a wɔyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze: na

column3: ɔbo a medze ato Josua enyim no; enyiwa esuon wɔ ɔbo kor do: hwɛ
column6: na mibeyi asaase no n'emumuyɛ da kor."

column4: hom mu nyimpa biara bɛfrɛfrɛ ne nyɛnko aba wenyindua na adɔmbadua ase."
